message.content:
Reinforcement Learning, Rule Learning. 

Reinforcement learning is the main focus of the paper, as the authors present a decision tree based approach to function approximation in reinforcement learning. They compare their approach with other function approximators on three reinforcement learning problems. 

Rule learning is also present in the paper, as the decision tree is a type of rule-based model. The authors use the decision tree to approximate the optimal policy in the reinforcement learning problems they consider.
